highlightExtensionDescription.message: Highlights changes made to a website since last visit

watchExtensionDescription.message: Regularly monitors a website for changes

watchTitle.description: Title of the page action popup

watchUnsupported.message: SiteDelta Watch does not support monitoring this page.
watchUnsupported.description: Text that the current page is unsupported

watchDisabled.message: SiteDelta Watch does not monitor this page.
watchDisabled.description: Text that watching of the current page is disabled

watchEnabled.description: Text that watching of the current page is enabled

watchButtonOpenAll.description: Button to open all changed pages

watchButtonWatch.description: Button to configure/enable SiteDelta Watch for the current page

watchNextScan.description: Label for the next scan time

highlightTitle.description: Title of the page action popup

highlightTitleUnavailable.message: SiteDelta Highlight does not support monitoring this page.
highlightTitleUnavailable.description: Title of the page action popup when not available for the current page

highlightTitleNoChanges.description: Title of the page action popup when no changes are found

highlightTitleChanges.description: Title of the page action popup when changes are found

highlightTitleSelectRegion.description: Title of the page action popup while selecting a region

configRegionsAdd.description: Button to add a new region

configScanOnLoad.message: Automatically scan known pages (shown in SiteDelta icon)
configScanOnLoad.description: Label for checkbox to enable automatically scanning pages on load

configHighlightOnLoad.message: Automatically highlight changes on known pages
configHighlightOnLoad.description: Label for checkbox to enable automatically highlighting pages

configEnableContextMenu.message: Enable SiteDelta context menu on pages and button
configEnableContextMenu.description: Label for checkbox to enable SiteDelta context menus

configCheckDeleted.description: Label for checkbox to enable the check for deletions

configCheckImages.description: Label for checkbox to enable the check for image changes

configIgnoreCase.description: Label for checkbox to ignore case when checking

configIgnoreNumbers.description: Label for checkbox to ignore numbers when checking

configBackground.description: Tooltip for text fields with background color

configBorder.description: Tooltip for text fields with border color

configAddColors.description: Label for text fields for background and border color of added text

configRemoveColors.description: Label for text fields for background and border color of removed text

configMoveColors.description: Label for text fields for background and border color of removed text

configIncludeColors.description: Label for text field for border color of included regions

configExcludeColors.description: Label for text field for border color of excluded regions

configShowRegions.description: Label for check box to outline include and exclude regions

configWatch.description: Label for text fields concerning watch / delay settings

highlightButtonHighlight.description: Button to highlight changes on the current page

highlightButtonDelete.description: Button to delete the current page

manageKnownPages.description: Region title for the list of monitored pages

manageDelete.description: Button to delete the selected page

manageOpen.description: Button to open the selected page
